name: In the Matter of John SHALLENBERGER, individually and t/d/b/a Shallway Corporation, National Childrens Audition and other names, Appellant, v. Velma INGELIDO, t/d/b/a Valerie Lee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of John SHALLENBERGER, individually and t/d/b/a Shallway Corporation, National Childrens Audition and other names, Appellant, v. Velma INGELIDO, t/d/b/a Valerie Lee.
attorneys: Timothy J. O’Connell, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Thomas M. Bailaron, Deputy Atty. Gen., Renardo L. Hicks, Director, Bureau of Consumer Protection, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
591 A.2d 1053
In the Matter of John SHALLENBERGER, individually and t/d/b/a Shallway Corporation, National Childrens Audition and other names, Appellant, v. Velma INGELIDO, t/d/b/a Valerie Lee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 10, 1991.
Decided May 29, 1991.
Timothy J. O’Connell, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Thomas M. Bailaron, Deputy Atty. Gen., Renardo L. Hicks, Director, Bureau of Consumer Protection, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
